name: Wear A Mask
description:
The COVID‑19 pandemic is an ongoing global event. The outbreak was first identified in December 2019 in Wuhan, China. The World Health Organization declared the outbreak a Public Health Emergency of International Concern on 30 January 2020 and a pandemic on 11 March.

Each grave represents a life lost to the virus in the last day, updated from live data.

You may feel isolated, but you are not alone.

WASD to walk

SPACE to pickup or place a rose.

Code by Nic M

Art by Matt Griffiths

Heavily inspired by Awkward Silence Games' beautiful "Wash Your Hands" with permission.
